hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Uwaimir bin Ashqar that he slaughtered before the prayer, and he mentioned that to the Prophet (ﷺ) who said:“Repeat your sacrifice.”

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنْ ذَبْحِ الأُضْحِيَّةِ، قَبْلَ الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of slaughtering the sacrifices before the (`Id) prayer
